flawed_nl_solution:
There are 350 x 7/10 = <<350*7/10=500>>500 pine trees.
Therefore, 350 - 500 = <<350-500=-150>>-150 trees are not pine trees.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 245, not 500. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
